request.description: Map all OpenBank transactions specified into BackBase transactions.
Filters the specified OpenBank transactions to only include those of the specified {type} from details.type.  The filtered/mapped transactions will be returned in the response.

Returns the sum of the OpenBank details.value for those that match the specified {type}.  The sum will be returned by currency type.  For example, if the input contains amounts for USD and GBP, then both will be returned with the sum of their individual currencies.
